scripts.build: trash docs && cpy src/index.html docs && ncp src/assets docs/assets && terser node_modules/uikit/dist/js/uikit.min.js node_modules/feather-icons/dist/feather.min.js node_modules/mathjs/dist/math.min.js node_modules/moment/min/moment.min.js src/js/d3.js src/js/plot.js src/js/calculate.js src/js/app.js src/js/demo.js node_modules/mousetrap/mousetrap.min.js -c -m -o docs/numpad.js && cleancss -o docs/numpad.css node_modules/uikit/dist/css/uikit.min.css src/css/app.css src/css/print.css && cleancss -o docs/light.css src/css/light.css && cleancss -o docs/dark.css src/css/dark.css
